covenant_summary.description: Must provide a comprehensive summary table of all financial covenants with names, definitions, thresholds, and testing frequency.

leverage_covenant.description: Must correctly extract the leverage ratio covenant including its definition (typically Total Debt / EBITDA) and the applicable threshold levels.

coverage_covenant.description: Must correctly extract the coverage ratio covenant (interest coverage or fixed charge coverage) including its definition and threshold levels.

testing_frequency.description: Must correctly identify how and when covenants are tested, including measurement period and testing dates.

extraction_methodology.description: Must describe a logical approach to locating and parsing covenant information from the credit agreement.
